title: Super Monkey Ball 2: Sakura Ed v1.2
description:
EveryoneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s favorite monkeys keep the ball rolling with this exclusive version of the arcade to console classic for your smartphone.

Roll around the Far East, as you tilt and steer one of four adorable monkeys through 125 themed mazes and a beautiful world of cherry blossoms. Just grab your bananas along the way to earn extra lives before time runs out. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s so easy to play, even a monkey could do it!!

Features

GO BANANAS 
-Play as one of 4 adorable Monkeys: Aiai, MeeMee, Baby, and GonGon

JUST ROLL WITH IT: 6 Worlds, 125 Themed Stages
-Sinking Swamps, Cobalt Caverns, Ultra Heaven, Jumble Jungle and PirateÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ocean. Includes 10 stages from the exotic Far East World.

NEVER QUIT MONKEY-ING AROUND 
Play 4 additional Mini Games:

-Monkey Target: Guide your monkey to the bullÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s-eye, launch into the sky and grab as many bananas as you can. 
-Monkey Golf: Monkeys play golf .. who knew? Grab your clubs and tee off with 18 holes of banana bliss.
-Monkey Bowl: One of the original mini games returns for ten frames of monkey ten-pin bowling madness!
-Monkey Base: With up to 4 players on one device, use your monkey to catch and launch orbs that your friends launch at you. Only the smartest monkey will win! (Exclusively on tablets)

BREATHTAKING VISUALS
-New environmental effects that bring stunning and colorful 3D worlds to life.

**Please note: This game requires an additional download of 585mb after the initial download**

What's in this version:
-Gyroscope calibration issue.  For devices that are unable to calibrate during the tutorial, game will bypass this option and allow you to continue the tutorial
-Other bug fixes and improvements
